column5: My 07 75hp optimax is running fine but today the warning beep stopped beeping as I turn the ignition key. Anyone had this problem or have any idea how I met check this out?? Don't even know where the alarm device is? Thanks Landry
The alarm is in the throttle control.

Sounds like it may be a blown speaker, aka alarm device.  Had the issue with a 150 hp Black Max.  Not sure what the price for Opti but as I remember the Black Max one was fairly reasonable.  It was basically a small speaker inside a grey plastic housing.
Not sure if this helps or not but at least it will help you find it...:  http://media.channelblade.com/EProWebsiteMedia/3506/Late%20model%20Optimax%20outboard%20Guardian%20warning%20horn%20chart.pdf
Someone else suggested my battery had low voltage so I will test with a new battery first. Great ideas guys. Thanks.
Fixed it myself. The alarm had a broken wire connector. Thanks for the Leo everyone.
